name: Solitude (Jestersheepy)
description:
Enjoy 3 levels of this twin stick shooter where you delve into an ice realm to wipe out the growing ice shards of death and destruction. 

I wish I had time to produce a more high tempo track for the in level areas as it would have helped the game a lot! 

Given more time I would have liked to have taken inspiration from Future cop L.A.P.D, and old classic I enjoyed in my early gaming and pushed an angle of base assault (Seen a little in level 3). Something I may return to at somepoint. 


Couple of disclaimers: 
If the main menu appears to not work it's due to the mouse stealing focus. Retry with a controller as the main input method. 

On the second level you may get stuck with the first jump, left trigger is to teleport (No time for tutorials).

There are also some Fatal errors that have been occurring, it's a good thing I implemented a save system so that your hard earned level completion, upgrades and currency are all safe. Not too sure why this error is occurring.
